item.description:
With Halloween nearly upon us, it's time for a horror movie:

Saw V

Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) might be dead, but his traps live on in this fifth Saw entry, which finds the series' production designer David Hackl at the helm for his debut directing gig. Saw IV scribes Patrick Melton and Marcus Dunstan return for more mind-bending fun. Dexter's Julie Benz co-stars in this Twisted Pictures production for Lionsgate Films. - Jeremy Wheeler, All Movie Guide

Discounted tickets are $8.50 instead of $10. Exact change is appreciated, but not a big deal.

Also, I will have $3 small popcorn and $3 small soda vouchers for sale.

Guests are welcome, but please include them in your RSVP so I have an idea how many people to expect.

*UPDATE*

The movie starts at 7:05, so lets plan on meeting out front around 6:30 or so to give us time to meet, get tickets, and any snacks, etc.
item.name: Saw V
